name: FM_SUSPECT_ICE
description: True if difference between measured brightness temperature and flat sea model > Tm_DT_ice

name: FM_L1C_ERROR
description: True if L1c BT value is invalid (NaN) or any of the L1c snapshot quality error flags are non-zero

name: FM_OUT_OF_RANGE
description: True if difference between measured brightness temperature and that derived with default forward model > Tm_out_of_range

name: FM_FARA_INTERP
description: True if interpolation used to calculate TEC from AUX_FARA_x

name: FM_L1C_SUN
description: True if any of the L1c flags sun point, sun tails, or sun glint fov are true.

name: FM_OTT
description: True if Ocean Target Transformation has been applied to this measurement

name: FM_MOON_SPEC_DIR
description: True if difference between specular direction and target to moon direction < Tm_angle_moon

name: FM_GAL_NOISE_ERROR
description: True if uncertainty on galactic noise source > Tm_max_gal_noise_error

name: FM_OUTLIER
description: True if outlier measurement; if false, not outlier measurement

name: FM_RESOL
description: True if major axis of the footprint ellipse is greater than threshold Tg_resol_max_ocean

name: FM_VALID
description: Flag set if measurement is valid according to decision tree criteria PRP_12-1

name: FM_LOST_DATA
description: Flag set if measurement not used due to lack of companion polarization

name: FM_L1C_RFI
description: True if measurement is flagged as contaminated by RFI in L1c

name: FM_L1C_SOFTWARE_ERROR
description: Flag set if L1c Software_Error_flag is set

name: FM_L1C_INSTRUMENT_ERROR
description: Flag set if L1c Instrument_Error_flag is set

name: FM_L1C_ADF_ERROR
description: Flag set if L1c ADF_Error_flag is set

name: FM_L1C_CALIBRATION_ERROR
description: Flag set if L1c Calibration_Error_flag is set

name: FM_L2_RFI
description: Flag set if measurement is suspected of being contaminated by RFI
